{"id":514380465,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 days, 19 hours","timestamp":1624879230,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/514380465/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Word Abbreviation","memory":"6.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool validWordAbbreviation(string word, string abbr) {\n        int i = 0, j = 0;\n        while (i < word.size() || j < abbr.size()) {\n            if (i >= word.size() || j >= abbr.size()) return false;\n            if (isalpha(abbr[j])) {\n                if (abbr[j++] != word[i++]) return false;\n                continue;\n            }\n            int num = abbr[j++] - '0';\n            if (num == 0) return false;\n            while (j < abbr.size() && isdigit(abbr[j])) num = num * 10 + (abbr[j++] - '0');\n            i += num;\n        }\n        return i == word.size() && j == abbr.size();\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-word-abbreviation"}
